name: Freedom Of Speech compilation CD
description:
Upstart indy hip-hop label Chaotic Mine Records presents a politically fueled compilation featuring an all-star lineup of hip-hop artists from Grand Rapids, MI. Out of struggle comes great artistry. Grand Rapids is the 2nd largest city in the state with the worst economy & highest unemployment rate in the US. There is little to no radio airplay or media exposure in ultra-conservative West Michigan. These artists got together as one voice to express their unfiltered opinions on the political & economic state of affairs in their environment. All of the production was handled by Nottingham UK resident, Anno Domini (bangin boom-bap beats for fans of DJ Muggs, Evidence & Alchemist). 

Tracklisting:

1. FREEDOM OF SPEECH - IllKontent, Sean-e 
2. SLAVE - MC Fabiano, Rick Chyme ,Suport 
3. FLAGS OF OUR FATERS - Sean-e, Jess G 
4. TO THOSE - Steddy, IllKontent ,E-Dub
5. TRANSFORMATION - Ed Niño 
6. WORDS - MC Fabiano 
7. WAR - IllKontent, Sean-e, Ed Niño 
8. STRIPES & STARS - DJ M-Select , DJ Konspiracy, IllKontent 
9. WORLD OF PAIN - Sleeper Cell
10. CHAOTIC MINE - Sean-e, Dante Cope, IllKontent 
11. EVERYTHING'S CORRUPT - Norm Biz, Rick Chyme, Nixon, IllKontent
12. KINGDOM OF HEAVEN - Jihad Islam 
13. AMERICAN PRIDE - Kracker Jack, IllKontent, Steddy, Ed Niño 
14. FREE MINDS - Suport, Rick Chyme, Donnie D, IllKontent, DJ M-Select 
15. UNCOVERED - Steddy
16. VOICE - Mr. Smith, Kracker Jack, DJ M-Select
17. PATRIOT - IllKontent, DJ Konspiracy

name: Vegtible Bros. - From My Aunt Bobbie's Records EP CD-R
description:
"From My Aunt Bobbie's Records" is a loop-based instrumental project conceived from about 20 vinyl lps left to me by my late aunt, Bobbie Jones. She was a beautiful , eclectic woman, who loved sports (Lions), fashion, and people. Me and DJ M-Select produced the music on rudimentary beatmaking tools. The sessions were open and accepting, we listened, sampled, and programmed a little. Me, Freeze and Mean Mark later added some freestyle vocals. This project was envisioned as a record, we will be pressing the vinyl version soon. We hope you enjoy the vibe of "My Aunt Bobbies Records". Feel free to post any samples you recognize in the comment section. Rest in Peace, Aunt Bobbie

- Vito, Vegtible Bro 1 


Tracklisting:

1   Trippin' (3:10) 
2   Mono (1:20) 
3   Krash Bandit (2:45) 
4   1956 (2:30) 
5   Uppineah (4:11) 
6   Mono 2 (0:13) 
7   Keyholes (4:12) 
8   Live On (3:22) 
9   Trippin' (Vocals) w/ Freeze & Mean Mark (3:09) 
10 Uppineah (Vocals) w/ Freeze & Mean Mark (2:35)
